content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4054.2 - Scale of weights for age

State Regulations

The following weights shall be carried when they are
not stated in the conditions of the race: (a) Scale of weights for age: steeplechases. Image
1
